text: 8|66|eninum, niccayamaka unkalil palavinam irukkiratu enpatai allah nankarintu kontu tarcamayam (atai) unkalukku ilakuvakki vittan. Akave, unkalil porumaiyum, cakipput tanmaiyum utaiya nuru perkaliruntal (marra) irunuru perkalai venruvituvarkal. (Ittakaiya) ayiram per unkalil iruntal allahvin utavi kontu (marra) irantayiram perkalai venru vituvarkal. Allah porumaiyutaiyavarkalutan irukkiran
